name: SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_IC
help: Called every given time, when unit in combat

name: SMART_EVENT_UPDATE_OOC
description: When out of combat and timer at the begining between {pram1} and {pram2} ms (and later repeats every {pram3} and {pram4} ms)
help: Called every given time, when unit is out of combat

parameters.description: Core will check whether this event should fire every min - max milliseconds

parameters.name: Repeat Maximum

parameters.description: Core will check whether this event should fire every min - max milliseconds

name: SMART_EVENT_DEATH

name: SMART_EVENT_EVADE

name: SMART_EVENT_RANGE

parameters.description: Minimum distance between creature and its victim to trigger the event

parameters.description: Maximum distance between creature and its victim to trigger the event

parameters.name: Repeat Min
parameters.description: Minimum timer value to check for event

parameters.name: Repeat Max
parameters.description: Maximum timer value to check for event

description: When victim in range {pram1} - {pram2} yards (check every {pram3} - {pram4} ms)
help: Checks every given time interval if victim is in given range (you shouldn't use this event)

parameters.name: No Hostile
parameters.description: If false, only hostile units will trigger the event

parameters.description: Respawn type to check

parameters.name: Map Id
parameters.description: Respawn Type must be either SMART_SCRIPT_RESPAWN_CONDITION_NONE or SMART_SCRIPT_RESPAWN_CONDITION_MAP

parameters.name: Zone
parameters.description: Respawn Type must be either SMART_SCRIPT_RESPAWN_CONDITION_NONE or SMART_SCRIPT_RESPAWN_CONDITION_AREA

description: On respawn {pram2value:choose(0):{pram3value:choose(0):|in zone {pram3}}|on map {pram2}{pram3value:choose(0):| and in zone {pram3}}}
help: Called after object respawn (contrary to c++ scripts: also after first spawn!)

name: SMART_EVENT_PASSENGER_REMOVED

parameters.name: Specific seat

parameters.name: Seat ID
parameters.description: If you want to use this parameter, set param 'specific seat' to True

help: Called when passenger leaves or switches seat on vehicle

name: SMART_EVENT_SPELL_OBJECT_TARGET_SELECT
help: Called when selecting target for single target spells. You can remove object in this event

name: SMART_EVENT_SPELL_DESTINATION_TARGET_SELECT
help: Called when selecting destination position for spell. You can override position in this event

name: SMART_EVENT_SPELL_OBJECT_AREA_TARGET_SELECT_SINGLE
name_readable: On single object while area target selection
help: Called when selecting targets for area spells. This event is called once for each target. You can remove target with action SPELL_REMOVE_OBJECT. The target is invoker of action
description: On single object while area target selection

name: SMART_EVENT_AURA_CHECK_AREA_TARGET
help: Executed when area aura checks if it can be applied on target

name: SMART_EVENT_AURA_ON_DISPEL
help: Executed when aura is dispelled by a unit

name: SMART_EVENT_AURA_AFTER_DISPEL
help: Executed after aura is dispelled by a unit

name: SMART_EVENT_AURA_ON_APPLY
help: Executed when aura effect is applied with specified mode to target. Should be used when effect handler preventing/replacing is needed, do not use this hook for triggering spellcasts/removing auras etc - may be unsafe

name: SMART_EVENT_AURA_AFTER_APPLY
help: Executed after aura effect is applied with specified mode to target

name: SMART_EVENT_AURA_ON_REMOVE
help: Executed after aura effect is removed with specified mode from target. Should be used when effect handler preventing/replacing is needed, do not use this hook for triggering spellcasts/removing auras etc - may be unsafe

name: SMART_EVENT_AURA_AFTER_REMOVE
help: Executed when aura effect is removed with specified mode from target

name: SMART_EVENT_AURA_ON_EFFECT_PERIODIC
help: On effect update periodic

name: SMART_EVENT_AURA_ON_EFFECT_UPDATE_PERIODIC
help: Executed when periodic aura effect is updated

name: SMART_EVENT_AURA_DO_EFFECT_CALC_AMOUNT
help: Executed when aura effect calculates amount

name: SMART_EVENT_AURA_DO_EFFECT_CALC_PERIODIC
help: Executed when aura effect calculates periodic data

name: SMART_EVENT_AURA_DO_EFFECT_CALC_SPELL_MOD
help: Executed when aura effect calculates spellmod

name: SMART_EVENT_AURA_ON_EFFECT_ABSORB
help: Executed when absorb aura effect is going to reduce damage

name: SMART_EVENT_AURA_AFTER_EFFECT_ABSORB
help: Executed after absorb aura effect reduced damage to target - absorbAmount is real amount absorbed by aura

name: SMART_EVENT_AURA_ON_EFFECT_SPLIT
help: Executed when the caster of some spell with split dmg aura gets damaged through it

name: SMART_EVENT_AURA_DO_CHECK_PROC
help: Executed when aura checks if it can proc

name: SMART_EVENT_AURA_DO_PREPARE_PROC
help: Executed before aura procs (possibility to prevent charge drop/cooldown)

name: SMART_EVENT_AURA_ON_PROC
help: Executed when aura procs

name: SMART_EVENT_AURA_AFTER_PROC
help: Executed after aura proced

name: SMART_EVENT_AURA_ON_EFFECT_PROC
help: Executed when aura effect procs

name: SMART_EVENT_AURA_AFTER_EFFECT_PROC
help: Executed after aura effect proced

name: SMART_EVENT_SPELL_SUCCESSFUL_CAST
help: Called after spell is successfully casted by creature

name: SMART_EVENT_CINEMATIC_FINISHED
help: Either if player force closes cinematic or not

name: SMART_EVENT_AURA_REMOVED
help: Called when aura is removed from creature
description: On {pram1value:choose(0):any aura|aura from spell {pram1}}{pram2value:choose(0):|, effect {pram2}} is removed{pram3value:choose(0):| (with mode {pram3})}
